tagline: Multilingual Developer | IT Enthusiast | Book & Travel Lover
about_description: Hello! I’m Henry, a multilingual developer based in Japan. I speak English, Japanese, Vietnamese, and basic Chinese. I am passionate about technology, self-improvement, and cultural exploration.
edu_chibamode: Chiba Mode Business College - International Business IT Course (2023–2025)
motivation_text: I attended the company's briefing and factory tour and was deeply impressed by the innovative solutions the company is pioneering in various industries using cutting-edge technologies. I was particularly drawn to the vision of solving societal issues like the declining birthrate and aging population. I hope to contribute my development skills and grow with the company.
appeal_text: I am proactive, communicative, and responsible. I can assess situations calmly and take swift action. I have worked in diverse teams and built strong relationships. My sense of responsibility is deeply rooted in Japanese culture, and I believe these qualities will contribute to both my personal growth and the company's development.
